title: after 5 seasons you'd think that the store would be fixed
body: "session has expired" why is this still an issue

replies.body: Not to mention changing tabs STILL brings you back to the homepage every time. I just want to look at my damn rune page before I buy a rune is that so much to ask
its disgusting, riot would know about all this 100% there is not a chance they haven't noticed it. pathetic
5 seasons. lmao 5 years still not fixed how is this possible
I always use the champions section of my profile to buy champions and skins because its less crap. But for everything else though, I must endure torture.
well i'd personally expect the store to be a lot faster to use. I mean switching tabs and such can take a long time for what it is
yeah it's just like riots way of saying store is loading
